404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

503.description: Maximal number of Tasks in Queue reached

post.summary: Retrieve Series from external C-MOVE SCP

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed or Retrieve Studies specified in CSV from external archive service invoked with missing Content-type header

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

503.description: Maximal number of Tasks in Queue reached

post.summary: Retrieve Instance from external C-MOVE SCP

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed or Retrieve Studies specified in CSV from external archive service invoked with missing Content-type header

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title Retrieve queue

503.description: Maximal number of Tasks in Queue reached

post.summary: Mark Study for retrieve from external C-MOVE SCP

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

post.summary: Mark Series from external C-MOVE SCP

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

post.summary: Mark Instance from external C-MOVE SCP

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

post.summary: Retrieve Studies specified in CSV from external C-MOVE SCP

204.description: Empty file or Incorrect field position or Not a CSV file or Invalid UIDs or Duplicate Retrieves suppressed.

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed or CSV field for Study Instance UID specified as less than 1

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

503.description: Maximal number of Tasks in Queue reached

post.summary: Mark Studies for Retrieve specified in CSV from external C-MOVE SCP

204.description: Empty file or Incorrect field position or Not a CSV file or Invalid UIDs or Duplicate Retrieves suppressed.

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed or CSV field for Study Instance UID specified as less than 1

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

post.summary: Retrieve matching Studies from external C-MOVE SCP

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or C-FIND SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

503.description: Maximal number of Tasks in Queue reached

503.description: Maximal number of Tasks in Queue reached

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or C-FIND SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

post.summary: Mark matching Series for retrieve from external C-MOVE SCP

400.description: Validation for one of the query parameters failed

404.description: No such Archive AE Title or Move SCP AE Title or C-FIND SCP AE Title or Retrieve queue

aetPathParam.name: aet
aetPathParam.description: AE Title to register or unregister

findSCPPathParam.name: ExternalAET
findSCPPathParam.description: AE Title of primary C-FIND SCP

secondaryFindSCPPathParam.name: OriginalAET
secondaryFindSCPPathParam.description: AE Title of secondary C-FIND SCP to query for Studies returned from externalAET

queryAETPathParam.name: queryAET
queryAETPathParam.description: AE Title of C-FIND SCP to query for matching Studies

patientPathParam.name: patientID
patientPathParam.description: Patient ID and Issuer encoded as HL7 CX

priorPatientPathParam.name: priorPatientID
priorPatientPathParam.description: Prior Patient ID and Issuer encoded as HL7 CX

studyPathParam.name: study
studyPathParam.description: Study Instance UID for a single Study

seriesPathParam.name: series
seriesPathParam.description: Series Instance UID for a single Series

instancePathParam.name: instance
instancePathParam.description: SOP Instance UID for a single Instance

framesPathParam.name: frames
framesPathParam.description: comma or %2C separated list of one or more non duplicate frame numbers

spsIDPathParam.name: spsID
spsIDPathParam.description: Scheduled Procedure Step ID of a MWL Item

entityPathParam.name: Entity
entityPathParam.description: Entity of which Attribute Filter is to be returned

typePathParam.name: Attribute Set Type
typePathParam.description: Type of which Attribute Set is to be returned

codingSchemeDesignatorPathParam.name: codingSchemeDesignator
codingSchemeDesignatorPathParam.description: Coding Scheme Designator of Rejection Note

taskIDPathParam.name: taskID
taskIDPathParam.description: JMS Message ID of queue message

newExporterIDPathParam.name: newExporterID
newExporterIDPathParam.description: New Exporter ID where task(s) shall be rescheduled

csvFieldPathParam.name: field
csvFieldPathParam.description: CSV field which contains the Study Instance UID

storageIDPathParam.name: storageID
storageIDPathParam.description: Storage ID of Storage System with on which referenced instance are located

studyUID.name: studyUID
studyUID.description: Study Instance UID for a single Study

seriesUID.name: series
seriesUID.description: Series Instance UID for a single Series

objectUID.name: instance
objectUID.description: SOP Instance UID for a single Instance

wadoRetrieveAccept.name: accept
wadoRetrieveAccept.description: Alternative to Accept header field for WADO-RS Retrieve Services

wadoRetrieveFramesAccept.name: accept
wadoRetrieveFramesAccept.description: Alternative to Accept header field for WADO-RS Retrieve Frames Service

wadoRetrieveBulkdataAccept.name: accept
wadoRetrieveBulkdataAccept.description: Alternative to Accept header field for WADO-RS Retrieve Bulkdata Service

wadoRetrieveMetadataAccept.name: accept
wadoRetrieveMetadataAccept.description: Alternative to Accept header field for WADO-RS Retrieve Metadata Services

presentationUID.name: presentationUID
presentationUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Presentation Object

presentationSeriesUID.name: presentationSeriesUID
presentationSeriesUID.description: Unique Identifier of the Series Containing The Presentation Object

fuzzymatching.name: fuzzymatching
fuzzymatching.description: fuzzy semantic matching of person names

orderByTime.name: orderby
orderByTime.description: specifies sort direction and field of tasks in returned list

includedefaults.name: includedefaults
includedefaults.description: include the default set of attributes specified by DICOM Part 18 (proprietary extension)

patientVerificationStatus.name: patientVerificationStatus
patientVerificationStatus.description: return only Patients with given Verification Status (proprietary extension)

incomplete.name: incomplete
incomplete.description: return only Studies which are marked as incomplete (proprietary extension)

retrievefailed.name: retrievefailed
retrievefailed.description: return only Studies which failed to be retrieved from fallback C-MOVE SCP (proprietary extension)

storageVerificationFailed.name: storageVerificationFailed
storageVerificationFailed.description: return only Studies which includes at least one Series with Failures of Last Storage Commitment (proprietary extension)

compressionfailed.name: compressionfailed
compressionfailed.description: return only Studies which includes at least one Series with Failures of Last Compression (proprietary extension)

metadataUpdateFailed.name: metadataUpdateFailed
metadataUpdateFailed.description: return only Studies which includes at least one Series with Failures to update its Metadata (proprietary extension)

SplitStudyDateRange.name: SplitStudyDateRange
SplitStudyDateRange.description: Split Study Date Range in ISO-8601 duration format PnDTnHnMn

SendingApplicationEntityTitleOfSeries.name: SendingApplicationEntityTitleOfSeries
SendingApplicationEntityTitleOfSeries.description: return Instances of Series of Studies received from this <AE Title> (proprietary extension)

StudyReceiveDateTime.name: StudyReceiveDateTime
StudyReceiveDateTime.description: return Instances of Series of Studies which were created between <datetime1>-<datetime2> (proprietary extension)

StudyAccessDateTime.name: StudyAccessDateTime
StudyAccessDateTime.description: return Instances of Series of Studies which were accessed between <datetime1>-<datetime2> (proprietary extension)

StudySizeInKB.name: StudySizeInKB
StudySizeInKB.description: return Instances of Series of Studies whose size is <min>-|-<max>|<min>-<max> (proprietary extension)

ExternalRetrieveAET.name: ExternalRetrieveAET
ExternalRetrieveAET.description: return Studies which are retrieveable from external <AE Title> (proprietary extension)

ExternalRetrieveAET!.name: ExternalRetrieveAET!
ExternalRetrieveAET!.description: return Studies which are not retrieveable from external <AE Title> (proprietary extension)

ExpirationDate.name: ExpirationDate
ExpirationDate.description: list Instances of Series which have expiration date between <datetime1>-<datetime2> (proprietary extension)

ExpirationState.name: ExpirationState
ExpirationState.description: return Studies with given Expiration State

allOfModalitiesInStudy.name: allOfModalitiesInStudy
allOfModalitiesInStudy.description: return Instances of Studies with have Series of ALL Modalities specified by multiple values of '00080061' or 'ModalitiesOfStudy' (proprietary extension).

storageID.name: storageID
storageID.description: return Instances of Studies which have objects on a particular Storage System (proprietary extension)

storageClustered.name: storageClustered
storageClustered.description: return Instances of Studies with objects on Storage System storageID which have also(=true)/no(=false) objects on an other Storage System of the Storage Cluster to which Storage System storageID belongs (proprietary extension)

storageExported.name: storageExported
storageExported.description: return Instances of Studies with objects on Storage System storageID which have also(=true)/no(=false) objects on the Storage System which is configured as Export Storage System of Storage System storageID (proprietary extension)

newDeviceName.name: newDeviceName
newDeviceName.description: New Device Name on which task(s) shall be rescheduled

dicomInstalled.name: dicomInstalled
dicomInstalled.description: Boolean to indicate whether this device is presently installed on the network

hasArcDevExt.name: hasArcDevExt
hasArcDevExt.description: Boolean to indicate whether this device has an archive device extension

dicomAssociationAcceptor.name: dicomAssociationAcceptor
dicomAssociationAcceptor.description: Boolean to indicate whether this Application Entity can accept associations

dicomAssociationInitiator.name: dicomAssociationInitiator
dicomAssociationInitiator.description: Boolean to indicate whether this Application Entity can initiate associations

register.name: register
register.description: indicates to register/unregister added/removed AE Titles, HL7 Application names and Web Application Names of added/updated Device

dcmRevokeRejection.name: dcmRevokeRejection
dcmRevokeRejection.description: return Rejection Note(s) used to revoke rejection

storageClusterID.name: dcmStorageClusterID
storageClusterID.description: only return Storage Systems belonging to a particular Storage Cluster

uriScheme.name: uriScheme
uriScheme.description: only return Storage Systems of a particular type

usage.name: usage
usage.description: only return Storage Systems used for the specified content

usableSpaceBelow.name: usableSpaceBelow
usableSpaceBelow.description: only return Storage Systems which have usable space below specified value

different.name: different
different.description: include Patients with different Patient Demographics / secondary C-FIND SCP

missing.name: missing
missing.description: include Patients missing at the PDQ Service / secondary C-FIND SCP

stgcmtStatus.name: status
stgcmtStatus.description: Storage Commitment Status to filter by

JMSMessageID.name: JMSMessageID
JMSMessageID.description: JMS Message ID to filter by

updatedBefore.name: updatedBefore
updatedBefore.description: maximum update date of Storage Commitment Result to filter by. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

rejectedBefore.name: rejectedBefore
rejectedBefore.description: maximum reject date of instances to delete. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

keepRejectionNote.name: keepRejectionNote
keepRejectionNote.description: indicates to keep rejection note instances - only delete rejected instances

storescp.name: storescp
storescp.description: AE Title of C-STORE SCP to which the Rejection Note is send. If absent, the AE Title of C-FIND SCP will be used

FreezeExpirationDate.name: FreezeExpirationDate
FreezeExpirationDate.description: Shall be set to true to freeze(=FROZEN) or false to unfreeze(=UPDATEABLE) Expiration Date of the Study. If the query param is absent, keep the ExpirationDate unchanged for FROZEN studies.

queueMsgStatus.name: status
queueMsgStatus.description: status of tasks to filter by

cancelTaskStatus.name: status
cancelTaskStatus.description: status of tasks to filter by

status.name: status
status.description: status of tasks to filter by

createdTime.name: createdTime
createdTime.description: tasks in queue which were created between <datetime1>-<datetime2>

updatedTime.name: updatedTime
updatedTime.description: tasks in queue which were updated between <datetime1>-<datetime2>

StudyInstanceUID.name: StudyInstanceUID
StudyInstanceUID.description: Study Instance UID to filter by

localAET.name: localAET
localAET.description: Archive AE Title to filter by

remoteAET.name: remoteAET
remoteAET.description: C-MOVE SCP AE Title to filter by

destinationAET.name: destinationAET
destinationAET.description: Destination AE Title to filter by

dcmQueueName.name: dcmQueueName
dcmQueueName.description: name of retrieve queue to filter by

dcmQueueNameRetrieve.name: dcmQueueName
dcmQueueNameRetrieve.description: name of retrieve queue to filter by

newQueueName.name: newQueueName
newQueueName.description: New Retrieve Queue on which task(s) shall be rescheduled

primaryAET.name: primaryAET
primaryAET.description: AE Title of the primary C-FIND SCP to filter by

secondaryAET.name: secondaryAET
secondaryAET.description: AE Title of the Secondary C-FIND SCP to filter by

checkDifferent.name: checkDifferent
checkDifferent.description: include/exclude tasks which check for different attributes of studies available at the primary and the secondary C-FIND SCP

checkMissing.name: checkMissing
checkMissing.description: include/exclude tasks which check for studies only available at the primary C-FIND SCP

comparefield.name: comparefield
comparefield.description: compare attribute set id to filter by

comparefields.name: comparefield
comparefields.description: compare attribute set id to filter by

storageVerificationPolicy.name: storageVerificationPolicy
storageVerificationPolicy.description: DB_RECORD_EXISTS: only check for existence of DB records, OBJECT_EXISTS: check if object exists on Storage System, OBJECT_SIZE: check size of object on Storage System, OBJECT_FETCH: fetch object from Storage System), OBJECT_CHECKSUM: recalculate checksum of object on Storage System, S3_MD5SUM: check MD5 checksum of object on S3 Storage System.

storageVerificationUpdateLocationStatus.name: storageVerificationUpdateLocationStatus
storageVerificationUpdateLocationStatus.description: Indicates if the Status of the Location DB record shall be updated on Storage Verification accordingly.

storageVerificationStorageID.name: storageVerificationStorageID
storageVerificationStorageID.description: Indicates that the object must be stored on (one of) the specified Storage System for successful Storage Verification.

ForceQueryByStudyUID.name: ForceQueryByStudyUID
ForceQueryByStudyUID.description: Force queries by Study Instance UID to secondary C-FIND SCP, although both C-FIND SCPs are instances of dcm4chee-arc

only-stgcmt.name: only-stgcmt
only-stgcmt.description: Only enable storage commitment without export

only-ian.name: only-ian
only-ian.description: Only enable Instance Availability Notification without export

searchResults.description: The search completed successfully, and the results are contained in the payload

searchResultsExternal.description: The search completed successfully, and the results are contained in the payload

countResultsExternal.description: Count completed successfully, and the count is contained in the payload

storeInstancesWarnings.description: Stored some of the Instances but warnings or failures exist for others.

createUpdateSPSSuccessful.description: Create Update SPS completed successfully, and the attributes are contained in the payload

HL7ACK.description: Message rejected by Receiving HL7 Application

importInstances.description: List of storage paths delimited by line breaks (CRLF)

PriorPatientIDs.description: Prior Patient IDs and Issuers of Patient IDs with Qualifiers Sequence

externalDocs.description: Attributes in DICOM JSON Model Format
